decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, Sequential Assessment; received 31/05/2018. Survey of uses in town centre; received 07/08/2018. ASB623 - 01 & ASB623 - 02; received 06/09/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for A3 (Restaurant) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times: 10:00 to 23:30 Monday to Sunday and on Bank Holidays.

Condition : 4 - There shall be no deliveries of food, equipment or other business materials to the premises and no collection of refuse waste or recyclable materials from the premises except between the hours of 07:00 - 22:00 Monday to Saturday and 10:00 - 18:00 on Sundays and public holidays.

Condition : 5 - Refuse storage arrangements shall be provided in accordance with the plans hereby approved and before the use commences.  No waste shall be stored outside the site or other than in the bins in the designated area. The lids of the bins shall be kept shut at all times other than when waste is being emptied into them or being removed from site.  Non-recyclable and perishable waste shall be removed from site no less frequently than once a week or as soon as the storage becomes full, whichever is the earlier.

Condition : 6 - The rating level of sound emitted from the plant equipment hereby approved shall not exceed background sound levels by more than 5dB(A) between the hours of 0700-2300 (taken as a 15 minute LA90 at the nearest sound sensitive premises) and shall not exceed the background sound level between 2300-0700 (taken as a 15 minute LA90 at the nearest sound sensitive premises). All measurements shall be made in accordance with the methodology of BS4142 : 2014 (Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound) and/or its subsequent amendments.
o Where access to the nearest sound sensitive property is not possible, measurements shall be undertaken at an appropriate location and corrected to establish the noise levels at the nearest sound sensitive property.
o Any deviations from the LA90 time interval stipulated above shall be agreed in writing with the local planning authority.
Condition : 7 - No servicing of the premises shall take place other than from the rear service / access road.

Condition : 8 - The premises shall only be used as a restaurant (Use Class A3), without any takeaway or delivery, and for no other purpose within the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
description: Change of use from A1 (retail) to A3 (restaurant) and installation of an extract flue
